mapper.select: SELECT id, commodity_name, commodity_name_en, unit_code, img_url, capacity FROM packaging_materials WHERE commodity_id = #{commodityId} and sale_status = #{saleStatus} and review_status = #{reviewStatus}

SELECT id, sku, commodity_name, commodity_name_en, sale_status, review_status, unit_code, size_length, size_width, size_height, weight, net_url, img_url, texture_name, texture_name_en, color_name, color_name_en, spec_name, spec_name_en, use_way, use_way_en FROM commodity c WHERE c.id = #{id}

SELECT c.sku, c.commodity_name, c.commodity_name_en, c.remark FROM commodity c left join commodity_brand cb on c.brand_id = cb.id
#{id}

SELECT id, sku, commodity_name, commodity_name_en FROM commodity WHERE (sku = #{sku} or commodity_name = #{commodityName} or commodity_name_en = #{commodityNameEn})
AND id != #{id}
SELECT id FROM commodity WHERE id = #{commodityId}
